<h1 align="center">
  Coronatrack
</h1>

A customizable dashboard for COVID-19 statistics. Each component, be it a stat card, table, or graph, is modular - collapsible, movable, and reproducible. 

## Quick start

Get node and npm, clone, npm install, npm start/gatsby develop.
